divs: Sighting DetailsI WAS AT SOMERSET NATIONAL FOREST NEAR BENNINGTON,VT.I WAS SITTING IN A CHAIR WATCHING THE SUN COME UP.I WAS WAITING FOR MY FRIEND TO WAKE UP TO GO FISHING.ACROSS THE ROAD OVER A RIVER I NOTICED THE OBJECTS.THEY WERE HOVERING OVER THE RIVER JUST A STONES THROW AWAY.THEY WOULD MOVE UP AND DOWN AND SIDE WAYS.I SAT THERE FOR ABOUT A HALF HOUR UNTILL I REALIZED I SHOULD TAKE SOME PICTURES.I REACHED IN THE CAMPER AND GRABED MY CAMERA AND SAT BACK DOWN IN MY CHAIR AND STARTED TO TAKE PICTURES.I TOOK MAYBE 20 PICTURES AND THEN GOT UP AND WALKED TO THE EDGE OF THE RIVER AND TOOK MORE PICTURES.I HAVE ZOOM ON MY CAMERA AND MANY PICTURES ARE OF WHEN I ZOOMED.AT ONE POINT ONE OF THEN RAISED UP A LITTLE AND CAME IN MY DIRECTION.I GOT THE FEELING IT WAS LOOKING ME OVER.I HEARD NO NOISE AND SAW NO FUMES OR EMISSIONS.I WAS NOT SCARED AT ALL JUST CURIOUS.THEY WERE NOT THREATING IN ANY MANNER.IN ALL I TOOK ABOUT 38 PICTURES.I WILL POST 6 PICTURES HERE.IF YOU WANT TO SEE ALL OF THEM I WOULD GLADY SEND THEM TO YOU.AT ONE POINT I DID NOT BELIEVE THEY WERE REAL.I THOUGHT MAYBE THEY WERE COBWEBS AND THE SUN WAS REFLECFING OFF THE STRANDS OF THE WEB???I DO NOT KNOW.I HOPE YOU PEOPLE CAN TELL WHAT THEY WERE.I GAVE YOU MY CELL PHONE NUMBER I DO NOT HAVE A LANDPHONE.I AM 68 YEARS ANDI AM NOT USE TO CELL PHONES.SOMETIMES I CAN NOT EVEN HEAR IT RING BUT IF YOU WANT MORE INFO OR ANYTHING KEEP CALLING ME OR E-MAIL ME.IN ALL I SAW THEM ABOUT A HOUR.MY FRIEND SLEPT THREW THE WOLE THING AND DID NOT SEE THEM.I HOPE THIS IS OF USE TO YOU. GARY JOHNSOM
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Bennington
There were no other sightings in Bennington on or around June 21st 2013
